creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: six-panels showing a landscape with two male figures and an ox; man in UL lies prone atop a rocky cliff with his right hand extended; man in center leads ox out of a wooden structure with a thatched roof; thick cloud cover present in first four panels
marks: Mark LRC: {Soga Jirō Teruo ga} [painted by Soga Jirō Te
title: Legends of Kyo Yū, Sō Ho, and Haku Raku
